concept.title: SMC PGI 5316.505 Ordering

conbody.p: (b)(2) For tracking and reporting purposes, obtain a Local Identification Number from SMC/PKC for each J&A prior to coordination. See SMC PGI 5306.301 for information on developing your justification for other than full and open competition.
